original_text:
Who has purposed this
    against Tyre, the bestower of crowns,
whose merchants were princes,
    whose traders were the honored of the earth?
korean_text: 면류관을 씌우던 자요 그 상인들은 고관들이요 그 무역상들은 세상에 존귀한 자들이었던 두로에 대하여 누가 이 일을 정하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Who has purposed this against Tyre
whose traders were the honored of the earth?
